text: The 2019 Africa Cup of Nations (also called AFCON 2019 and CAN 2019) was the 32nd edition of the Africa Cup of Nations tournament. The tournament to be hosted by Cameroon, but on January 9th CAF changed the host. Egypt was the host of this tournament. It was held from 21 June to 19 July 2019. == Teams == Because they withdrew from the 2017 Africa Cup of Nations qualification, Chad is banned from the tournament. ===Qualified teams=== The following teams qualified for the tournament: Team Method of qualification Date of qualification Finals appearance Last appearance Previous best performance FIFA ranking at start of event 24th 2017 (1957, 1959,
